title: Intex River Run 1 53'' Inflatable Floating Water Tube Lake Raft with Heavy-Duty Handles, Backrest and Cupholders, Red (4 Pack)
features: Set of 4 inflatable tubes built with durable 18 gauge vinyl
Mesh bottom keeps you cool and comfortable
Built-in backrest for easy cruising; All-around grab rope makes getting in and out easy
Easy-to-use connectors to keep your friends close; 2 cup holders to keep your beverage handy
2 air chambers for stability and comfort; 2 heavy-duty handles make carrying a breeze
description: Comfortable, fun, and relaxing, the 4-Pack Intex River Run Inflatable Tube fits 1 adult rider, letting you sit back and relax as you float down the river, in your pool, or on the lake. With safe, comfortable material that feels great against your skin, the raft doesn't heat up in the sun, letting you enjoy your fun afternoon at the beach. Separate air chambers in the backrest inflate to let you rest and relax as you float. Easy-to-use connectors let you link floats together to keep your friends close. The mesh bottoms allow water to flow through, washing you in cool water for an enjoyable ride. 2 separate air chambers ensure extra stability, so you don't rock or tip over as you float down the river. Featuring a quick-release valve that deflates in less than 60 seconds, the raft folds away for quick and convenient storage. Great for tubing veterans as well as new riders, the 4-pack Intex River Run Inflatable Tube makes for a fun, comfortable way to enjoy a summer afternoon at the beach.
